body.name: Aussie Deep Conditioner For Dry Hair with Avocado, Paraben Free, 3 Minute Miracle Moist, 16 Fl Oz Each, Triple Pack (Packaging May Vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: Comes in a pack of 3 bottles with 16 fluid ounces each for a total of 48 fluid ounces
Infused with avocado oil and jojoba oil to deeply hydrate dry hair
Paraben free formula moisturizes hair in just 3 minutes
Leaves hair silky, shiny, and smooth
body.description: If moisture is your number one priority, this conditioner will be at the top of your list. Banish dry hair in just 3 minutes with Aussie Miracle Moist 3 Minute Miracle Deep Conditioner. It absorbs quickly to transform struggling strands into silky, shiny waves. This rich, creamy formula is infused with avocado oil and jojoba oil and is great for all hair types. Massage into clean, wet hair, wait 3 minutes and rinse. Youll emerge from the shower with hair that looks great and smells even better! Plus, its certified PETA Cruelty-Free and made without paraben'seven more to feel good about.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 80’s hair product still rocks
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t want to buy this, because the last time I used it was probably 1995 & I’ve since moved on to wayyyy fancier products which aren’t hideously packaged. But, I have always been on the hunt for a great conditioner for my coarse, curly, wild, long hair. I have tried so many, even many products made for ethnic hair (even though my ancestors came from Scandinavia & no further south than Germany on any side) and nothing has given me the softness & gloss I’ve been looking for.Well, I saw this Amazon deal & remembered this product from my youth, so for the price I said screw it, let’s do it.First, the negative: bottle looks like something that belongs in your teen’s bathroom, not yours. I’m a ho for good aesthetics, so I really dislike that. It’s really thick, so not easy to decant into a bottle, but I’ll come up with something. Its garish purple is ruining the vibe of my shower lol. Next, the smell. It’s not awful per se, but I lean very heavily toward orientals, incense, sandalwood- think Aveda or Pureology. So these cheap drug store vaguely fruity floral girly scents are NOT my jam. I have to pat some dark patchouli oil in my hair after using this so I don’t smell like a person who wears fuchsia nail polish.BUT… the good. There is a reason this product has been a best selling cult product for literally decades. It freaking works. My hair went from being mad about being too dry all the time to laying in glossy but not weighed down curls. It feels soft. It looks super healthy even though I desperately need a split ends trim. (Since my hair is so long, I rub a little extra in the ends as a leave in treatment without needing an extra product).Bottom line- value for $ cannot be beat & if you can tolerate this very not-chic bottle & fragrance, your curly girl hair will thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product Great Value
reviews.reviewText: Three of them for this price is phenomenal. This product has been around for a long, long time and the quality is still there. Great for moisturizing dry hair and a great leave in conditioner for dry ends. You get a lot of it for what you pay for. This is no thin, runny conditioner. This is thick and works all the tangles out as you put it in your hair. The smell is fresh and tropical. My hair smells great when I use this. I'll definitely repurchase but I won't need to for some time since you get three bottles. Definitely recommend if you have normal to very dry hair. Would be great to get a spray bottle, add some product and the rest water. Shake well and use as a leave in conditioner or dry hair before brushing.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the purchase
reviews.reviewText: Keeps my 4c hair manageable and soft and doesn’t dry my hair very moisturizing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can’t even tell you how many times I’ve repurchased this product between buying on Amazon and target. Amazons pricing is way better for the same product and can get a bulk pack. This stuff is great makes my hair so soft after using. Sometimes I condition before and then will use this to let it sit other times I use it on its own and it works great both ways. The smell is also a plus and makes my hair smell very clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Honestly bought for the smell. We use this for our daughter and she likes it also. I would recommend this for anyone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What You Heard is True
reviews.reviewText: I've been hearing folks talk about Aussie my whole teen-into-adult life, but had just stuck with cheaper V05 type options. Finally decided to take the plunge, and I am LOVING this stuff. My hair is silky smooth and I've properly noticed a difference.My hair type is thin and straight, and I've always had issues with volume - but this truly gives my hair shape that I am a fan of.Some tips (also willing to accept tips/criticism):You should leave conditioner in your hair for a bit for it to work effectively. I typically shampoo first, rinse immediately, conditioner, wash my face and body, then rinse my conditioner at the end.Also - if you're prone to oily hair like I am, you can always opt to condition just your tips OR just dilute for your scalp. I tend to do about a nickel sized dollop and run half through my ends/tips, then rub my hands together, run them for a brief moment under the water to thin, and place it on my scalp.Apologies if this is all general knowledge, it's stuff that took me into late 20s to figure out and I know it's still not perfect.TLDR: Solid product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was going to return part
reviews.reviewText: Inadvertently, I doubled my or so I was going to return 1/2, but then I used it!!! WOW! Well, now I'm keeping both orders. My hair is grey/white, brittle, and old. This stuff is great, just great. Do yourself a favor and order some ❤️.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have bleached hair and I need a conditioner that is super moisturizing. I have actually been spending 30-40 $ on fancy, salon products for my hair but I am also a college student and am trying to pinch pennies, so I finally decided that it was silly of me to spend that much. I was looking for a affordable conditioner that would help my damaged hair and then, I remembered I used this conditioner when I was like 14 and it worked SO well! This 3-pack is an insanely good deal. I leave this in my hair for about 10 minutes and it honestly moisturizes just as good as the expensive products I was using. The scent isn’t my favorite. It’s not overwhelming, so it’s tolerable but I usually go for more natural scented things like rosemary. For the price, it is worth it to me and I will continue to use this!

Je commence par ce que j'ai absolument adoré : l'odeur. J'ai passé tellement de temps sous la douche à sentir cette odeur, j'étais amoureuse. J'ai les cheveux crépus (4c) et donc je recherche un produit qui facilite le démêlage. Ce produit le facilitait mais pas aussi bien que d'autres que j'ai essayé. Je l'ai testé (et finit) il y a plus de 6 mois, je ne l'ai jamais renouvelé. J'ai pas eut le coup de foudre.
